Capital Adequacy Ratio Quantitative Disclosure Data:

Sumitomo Mitsui Trust Bank, Limited

Capital Adequacy Ratio Consoiidated

We calculate the BIS capital adequacy ratio on both a consolidated and noneconsoiidated basis in line with provisions of Article 14-2 of the Banking Act and on the basis of calculation formula prescribed under the criteria forjudging whether a bank's capital adequacy ratio is appropriate in light of assets held (the Financial Services Agency 2006 Notification No. 19, hereinafter referred to as the Notification).

Since the end of March 2017, we have adopted the Advanced internal RatingseBased (IRB) Approach for the calculation of credit risk-weighted assets, the Advanced Measurement Approach for the calculation of operational risk, and market risk regulations.

Scope of Consolidation Consoiidated
